translation.en: -I'll see you around. -Yeah, all right.
translation.zh: -回头见-嗯 好

translation.en: [woman mutters] What the fuck?
translation.zh: 搞什么啊

translation.en: Hi. Sorry. I think I was sleepwalking, 'cause my mom used to say
translation.zh: 嗨 抱歉 我应该是梦游了 我妈以前常说我的想象力过度活跃

translation.en: -that I have an overactive imagin-- -[door closes]
translation.zh: 我妈以前常说我的想象力过度活跃

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: [man on speakers] Ah, I took her for a walk.
translation.zh: 我带它出去散步

translation.en: I distinctly remember the clock saying it was 6:00 p.m.,
translation.zh: 我清楚记得时钟显示着傍晚六点

translation.en: and saying hey to my neighbor Glenn who was on his porch.
translation.zh: 也记得我和站在家门前的邻居格伦打了招呼

translation.en: And this was in the winter, so, you know, it was... it was dark outside already.
translation.zh: 那时候是冬天 所以外面天色已暗

translation.en: I came home, fed her, looked out the window, and bam, it was light outside.
translation.zh: 我回到家 喂了它 往窗外一看 天竟然还亮着

translation.en: I looked at the clock again and it said 5:00 p.m.
translation.zh: 我又看了看时钟 上面显示傍晚五点

translation.en: [woman] Wow.
translation.zh: -哇-对

translation.en: [man] Yeah. In my book, I interview several people with similar incidents
translation.zh: 在我的书中 我采访了一些经历过类似事件的人

translation.en: that don't jive with our notions of reality.
translation.zh: 这些事件与我们所谓的现实扯不上关系

translation.en: [woman] So, aliens?
translation.zh: 外星人吗？

translation.en: [man] That's certainly one explanation. Alien abductions.
translation.zh: 这是其中一种解释 被外星人绑架

translation.en: Accidentally slipping into parallel universes.
translation.zh: 不小心进入平行宇宙

translation.en: -[Sarah sighs] -Thought control.
translation.zh: 意念控制

translation.en: 30% employee discount just for you.
translation.zh: 30%员工折扣 给你的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢-不客气

translation.en: You're welcome. So, uh, Shannon's not here yet, but before she gets in,
translation.zh: -谢谢-不客气 莎侬还没到 但在她进来之前

translation.en: would you mind taking a look at the glue?
translation.zh: 你能去看一下胶水吗？

translation.en: She did it yesterday, but it's just a little...
translation.zh: 她昨天弄过了 但有点…

translation.en: Are... Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: I don't know. Um...
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: [inhales deeply] I just haven't been sleeping very well.
translation.zh: 我最近睡得不太好

translation.en: That's too bad.
translation.zh: 那太糟了

translation.en: Yeah, I've been having, like, really weird dreams.
translation.zh: 嗯 我老是做很奇怪的梦

translation.en: Really? About what?
translation.zh: 真的吗？梦见什么？

translation.en: Um... I don't know. Like...
translation.zh: 我不知道 就…

translation.en: Like, I've been seeing the same people over and over again.
translation.zh: 我不断重复地看到相同的人

translation.en: And, like, these strange places I've never been before.
translation.zh: 还有… 我不曾去过的奇怪地方

translation.en: And I don't know how to describe it, it just feels really weird.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么形容但就是感觉很奇怪

translation.en: And, like, really scary.
translation.zh: 而且很可怕

translation.en: That's horrible.
translation.zh: 那糟透了

translation.en: And, like... I've been having, like, weird things with time.
translation.zh: 而且… 我对时间的感知也怪怪的

translation.en: Weird things with time?
translation.zh: 对时间的感知怪怪的？

translation.en: Like, finding myself places and I don't know how I got there.
translation.zh: 我会发现自己在某处但却不知道自己怎么会在那里

translation.en: What... What does that mean, exactly?
translation.zh: 那具体是什么意思？

translation.en: Like, last night, I was gone for, like, 25 minutes,
translation.zh: 昨晚我走开了25分钟

translation.en: and when I looked at the clock, it showed that only two minutes had passed.
translation.zh: 但我看了时钟 它显示才过了两分钟

translation.en: So, like, I did some research online, and people talk about, um,
translation.zh: 所以我上网查了一下 人们说的是

translation.en: carbon monoxide poisoning, but I just don't think it's that.
translation.zh: 一氧化碳中毒 但我不认为是如此

translation.en: And then they also talk about, um, alien abductions. Do you believe in that?
translation.zh: 然后他们还说了 被外星人绑架 这你相信吗？

translation.en: No, I... Not really.
translation.zh: 不 不相信

translation.en: No?
translation.zh: 不信吗？

translation.en: Do you think this sounds similar to some of the stuff your mom went through?
translation.zh: 你觉得这听起来与你妈经历的某些事情相似吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Maybe you should talk to a doctor, Sarah.
translation.zh: 也许你应该去看个医生

translation.en: You know, get a professional opinion.
translation.zh: 寻求专业的意见

translation.en: -What do you think? -Maybe.
translation.zh: 你怎么想？ 也许吧

translation.en: [gasps] Joan! That's the guy from my dream.
translation.zh: 琼 那是我梦里的男人

translation.en: [Joan] Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [man] Turn it all off. It'll be the Dark Ages again!
translation.zh: 全都关掉 让黑暗时代再次降临

translation.en: [whispering] "Santiaguez."
translation.zh: -圣地格斯-我们都会消失

translation.en: [man] We'll all be gone except for those that are Sectilians that are...
translation.zh: 除了那些跟萨蒂科卫星

translation.en: that are in cahoots with Satico Satellite! God of technology!
translation.zh: 是一伙儿的外星昆虫人 科技之神

translation.en: Sits at the right hand of Zeus!
translation.zh: 坐在宙斯的右手边

translation.en: Powering all your electronic devices!
translation.zh: 为你所有的电子设备供电

translation.en: Light bulbs! Email! Internet! Satico Satellite...
translation.zh: 电灯泡 电子邮件 互联网 萨蒂科卫星

translation.en: -Tap. Good. Tap. Great! Tap. -[upbeat music playing]
translation.zh: 踏脚 好 踏脚 妙 踏脚 呱呱叫

translation.en: Excellent! Good. Very good!
translation.zh: 好 非常好 对

translation.en: Yes! Sweat out those margaritas!
translation.zh: 把鸡尾酒的热量全烧掉

translation.en: Let's cha-cha! Back, back, back, and cha-cha!
translation.zh: 恰 向后退 恰恰 向后退

translation.en: Back, back, back, and pump, pump.
translation.zh: 恰 向后退 恰恰 向后退 拉 拉 两下 拉 拉 两下

translation.en: Double. Now, pump, pump. Double. Good! Keep pulling! Yes!
translation.zh: 拉 拉 两下 拉 拉 两下 很好 继续拉 臀部迎上拳头

translation.en: Match that hip to your fist. Very good.
translation.zh: 很好 继续拉 臀部迎上拳头 非常棒

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Hi. Can I help you?
translation.zh: 嗨 有什么能帮到你吗？

translation.en: Do you remember me?
translation.zh: 你还记得我吗？

translation.en: Have you used us before?
translation.zh: 你用过我们的服务吗？

translation.en: I just wanted to talk to you.
translation.zh: 我只是想跟你谈谈

translation.en: Okay. About... plumbing? HVAC?
translation.zh: 好 谈关于… 管道？暖通空调？

translation.en: Plumbing.
translation.zh: 管道

translation.en: Kitchen? Bathroom?
translation.zh: 厨房？浴室？

translation.en: Kitchen.
translation.zh: 厨房

translation.en: Pipes. I need new pipes.
translation.zh: 水管 我需要新的水管

translation.en: All right. Pipes.
translation.zh: 好 水管

translation.en: Is that expensive?
translation.zh: 会很贵吗？

translation.en: Depends on the work. It's hard to tell until I check it out.
translation.zh: 取决于工程 得看一下才能知道

translation.en: Oh, you could come and check it out? I have money.
translation.zh: 你能过来看一下啊 我有钱

translation.en: Oh, well, that's usually not necessary until I'm...
translation.zh: 那个 在我开工之前 通常没必要…

translation.en: -[Sarah] Here. -...at the job. Oh, okay.
translation.zh: …先付钱 嗯 好

translation.en: Yeah. Sure. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 当然 没问题

translation.en: Great. So you'll come check it out tonight?
translation.zh: 太好了 那你今晚过来看一下咯？

translation.en: Well, we're almost closed and dispatch is gone, so, um...
translation.zh: 我们快要打烊了 调度员也走了

translation.en: I can probably squeeze you in in the morning, though.
translation.zh: 但我应该能安排一下明早过去

translation.en: In the morning. Tomorrow morning. Great. So you'll come tomorrow morning?
translation.zh: 早上 明天早上好 那你明早过来咯？

translation.en: [chuckles] You really want those pipes, huh?
translation.zh: 你还真想要那些水管啊

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: All righty. I'll... just need some information.
translation.zh: 好吧 我需要些你的资料

translation.en: Your name?
translation.zh: 名字？

translation.en: Agatha Kaine.
translation.zh: 阿加莎·凯恩

translation.en: -[man, softly] Okay. -Tomorrow, then?
translation.zh: -好-那明天咯？

translation.en: Yeah. Just need your address and phone number.
translation.zh: 对 还需要地址和电话号码

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: One... Mississippi.
translation.zh: 一秒

translation.en: Please, don't.
translation.zh: 求求你 不要

translation.en: Two... Mississippi.
translation.zh: 两秒

translation.en: [Darren] Listen to your heart, Agatha.
translation.zh: 听从你的内心 阿加莎

translation.en: Three... [demonic voice] Mississippi.
translation.zh: 三秒

translation.en: [Sarah] Clones.
translation.zh: 克隆体

translation.en: Hey, Miss Kaine. I'm Tom from Santiaguez Plumbing.
translation.zh: 嘿 凯恩小姐 我是圣地格斯管道公司的汤姆

translation.en: Yeah. It's good we're replacing this old galvanized pipe.
translation.zh: 换掉这些旧的镀锌管是件好事

translation.en: It's got tons of sclerosis.
translation.zh: 都腐蚀透了

translation.en: Oh. Those are better?
translation.zh: 哦 那种比较好吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Copper's the best.
translation.zh: 对 铜是最好的

translation.en: So, like, are you friends with any of the people you work with?
translation.zh: 你和你的同事们是朋友吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 不知道耶

translation.en: We get beers, like, once a month or something.
translation.zh: 我们偶尔会一起去喝杯啤酒

translation.en: What about the guy who made me this appointment?
translation.zh: 那个替我做预约的男人呢？

translation.en: That would be Ron. One of the owners.
translation.zh: 那是罗恩 老板之一

translation.en: He's one of the owners.
translation.zh: 他是老板之一啊

translation.en: Does he work every day?
translation.zh: 他每天都上班吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, he's pretty much there all day.
translation.zh: 对 他基本上天天都在店里

translation.en: [whispers] Has he ever told you about anything weird that's happened to him? -That's like-- -[door opens]
translation.zh: 你有没有告诉过你他经历了哪些奇怪的事？

translation.en: What? What is this? What's happening?
translation.zh: 这是什么？怎么回事？

translation.en: Hi. Nothing.
translation.zh: 嗨 没什么

translation.en: -[woman] What is going on? -Nothing.
translation.zh: -到底怎么回事？-没事

translation.en: What is he-- Hi. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 他在做什… 嗨 你在做什么？

translation.en: He's just replacing the pipes because we needed new pipes,
translation.zh: 他只是在换水管我们需要新的水管

translation.en: our pipes are really old.
translation.zh: 我们的水管太旧了

translation.en: -You're replacing the pipes? -Yeah, and I paid for them!
translation.zh: -你把水管换掉了？-对 我付钱了

translation.en: We're renting. I asked you to fix the scratches on the wall.
translation.zh: 这房子是租的 我让你把墙上的划痕修好

translation.en: We don't need new plumbing.
translation.zh: 我们不需要新的水管

translation.en: Mmm. Can you just put it back how it was?
translation.zh: 你能让它恢复原样吗？

translation.en: Miss Kaine, I-- I don't know if I'm authorized to do that, I mean--
translation.zh: 凯恩小姐 我不知道我是否有权这样做

translation.en: Miss Kaine?
translation.zh: 凯恩小姐？

translation.en: -[Tom] Plus, they're all gunked up-- -[woman] What did you call her? What?
translation.zh: -而且全都很脏-你刚叫她什么？

translation.en: [Tom] Agatha Kaine?
translation.zh: 阿加莎·凯恩？

translation.en: -[shushing] Listen. -Are you using an alias?
translation.zh: -听我说-你用化名了吗？

translation.en: Listen. Everything's fine.
translation.zh: 听我说 一切都没事

translation.en: He's gonna finish doing the floors, and I already paid for it,
translation.zh: 他会把地板铺好 我已经付钱了

translation.en: and he's gonna put the floor back the way it was.
translation.zh: 他会把地板铺成原先的样子

translation.en: And I-- I even called the guy about the walls,
translation.zh: 我甚至还打了电话给维修工他说下周才能来

translation.en: and he said he can't come until next week, so, it's-- it's all taken care of.
translation.zh: 我甚至还打了电话给维修工他说下周才能来 一切都处理好了

translation.en: Fine. This is fucking insane.
translation.zh: 行 这简直是疯了

translation.en: So, is Ron working tonight?
translation.zh: 那罗恩今晚上班吗？

translation.en: Okay. Here we go, now.
translation.zh: 好 开始咯

translation.en: -It's gonna sting just a little bit. -[hisses]
translation.zh: 这会有点疼

translation.en: And... And there we go.
translation.zh: 好 搞定

translation.en: All done. Great. I think we got it.
translation.zh: 完成了 非常好 没问题了

translation.en: -You did great. -Oh, good.
translation.zh: 你做得很棒 太好了 谢谢你

translation.en: -Thank you. -Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Um... And if... If I should get another nosebleed,
translation.zh: 如果我又再次流鼻血

translation.en: should I lean my head back or should I lean it forward?
translation.zh: 我是应该把头往后仰还是往前倾啊

translation.en: Yeah, always forward. Because if you lean your head back,
translation.zh: 总是向前倾 如果你把头往后仰的话

translation.en: then the blood is gonna flow down the back of your throat,
translation.zh: 血将会倒流到你的喉咙里

translation.en: and then you'll get nauseous and throw up,
translation.zh: 你会感到恶心 然后呕吐

translation.en: and you don't want that to happen.
translation.zh: 这样就不好了

translation.en: -[Sarah] Okay. -Okay? Good.
translation.zh: 好吗？很好

translation.en: Um... And I've been having a little trouble sleeping,
translation.zh: 我最近经常失眠

translation.en: 'cause I've been having these really weird dreams,
translation.zh: 因为我老是做这些很奇怪的梦

translation.en: and I've been kind of scared to go to sleep.
translation.zh: 搞得我有点不敢睡觉

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -And now I have some bruises on my body.
translation.zh: 对了 我身上有些淤青

translation.en: Do you know what that could be from?
translation.zh: 你知道是什么造成的吗？

translation.en: Well, um, you know, a bruise like that could really be from anything.
translation.zh: 会出现这种淤青的原因可多了

translation.en: You might've bumped into something, even if you didn't know that you did.
translation.zh: 可能是撞到了什么 只是自己不知道

translation.en: Uh, you know what would be a good idea, Sarah, for you?
translation.zh: 我有个好建议给你 莎拉

translation.en: I think you should get, uh, some blood work done through your GP,
translation.zh: 你应该去见见全科医生 做个血检

translation.en: um, and ask them to test for, uh, anemia.
translation.zh: 查一下你是否患有贫血

translation.en: Um... Partly because of the, uh... the nosebleeds you've been having.
translation.zh: 部分原因是因为你一直流鼻血

translation.en: if there's any coagulation problem,
translation.zh: 如果发现有凝血方面的问题

translation.en: that could-- that could tell you something about the bruises as well.
translation.zh: 这也能解释你身上出现的淤青

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: -好吗？-好

translation.en: -Okay. -All right. Okay. Good.
translation.zh: 好 很好

translation.en: Is there also a test, um, like, to see if I'm a clone?
translation.zh: 是否也有什么检查能查看我是不是克隆体啊？

translation.en: Uh, I'm sorry?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: Um, just a test to see if I'm, like, a clone?
translation.zh: 就检查一下我是不是克隆体

translation.en: A clone? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 克隆体？

translation.en: Well, I guess the one way to do that is we'd, uh, take your DNA test,
translation.zh: 我想其中一个方法是拿你的DNA检测结果

translation.en: and we'd take the DNA test of the other person,
translation.zh: 和另一个人的DNA检测结果核对一下

translation.en: and if they match,
translation.zh: 如果完全匹配

translation.en: then you've got a clone. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 就是有个克隆体了

translation.en: That's the only way I know.
translation.zh: 这是我知道的唯一方法

translation.en: Well, just 'cause I've been watching season five of Purgatory
translation.zh: 因为我之前看《炼狱》第五季的时候

translation.en: where Darren becomes a clone, and...
translation.zh: 达伦变成了克隆体 而这不禁让我想到了

translation.en: it just sort of got me thinking
translation.zh: 而这不禁让我想到了

translation.en: that, like, I look so much like my grandma,
translation.zh: 我长得非常像我外婆

translation.en: and I have all these old photos of her, and, like, we look exactly the same,
translation.zh: 我有她以前的照片我们长得一模一样

translation.en: and I can even sort of make the face she makes in the photos,
translation.zh: 而且我甚至能做出她在照片里的脸部表情

translation.en: and, like... uh... So, that would make sense,
translation.zh: 那么… 这么一来就说得通了因为我不认识她

translation.en: 'cause... I didn't know her. She was gone before I was born.
translation.zh: 这么一来就说得通了因为我不认识她 我出生前她就走了

translation.en: So maybe they would have needed her body
translation.zh: 所以如果我是她的克隆体的话他们可能需要她的身体

translation.en: to, like, recycle it into me if I was a clone of her.
translation.zh: 所以如果我是她的克隆体的话他们可能需要她的身体 来再生成我

translation.en: And I don't know who... would be doing it, like...
translation.zh: 我不知道这由谁来进行

translation.en: it could be the government, or demons, or...
translation.zh: 可能是政府 或者恶魔

translation.en: um, immortal alchemists, like Dee on Purgatory.
translation.zh: 或者永生的炼金术士像《炼狱》的迪伊一样

translation.en: [sighs] I just wanted to see if maybe we could, um, test for that.
translation.zh: 我只是想知道是否有办法查一下

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Um, Sarah, I'm...
translation.zh: 嗯 莎拉

translation.en: I'm an ear, nose, and throat specialist, that's my area of expertise.
translation.zh: 我是耳鼻喉科专家那是我擅长的领域

translation.en: So, I don't really know a lot about some of this other stuff.
translation.zh: 所以你说的这些 我其实并不太了解

translation.en: It doesn't sound very likely to me.
translation.zh: 但我觉得可能性不大

translation.en: And I'm not familiar with Purgatory, uh, whatever you mentioned, the series.
translation.zh: 而且你说的《炼狱》这个电视剧我也不太熟悉

translation.en: Um... You know what might be a good idea, is for you to, uh, talk to someone,
translation.zh: 不过我有个好主意你应该找个人谈谈

translation.en: to talk to a psychologist and--
translation.zh: 找个心理医生谈谈

translation.en: -Never mind. -No, and tell them--
translation.zh: -算了-告诉他们…

translation.en: Okay. That's okay. Um...
translation.zh: 不用了 没关系

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. Thank you. -[doctor] Mmm.
translation.zh: 非常抱歉 谢谢你

translation.en: Um, okay. Thank you. Bye.
translation.zh: 好 谢谢你 拜拜

translation.en: Hey. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: You look beautiful.
translation.zh: 你好美

translation.en: So do you.
translation.zh: 你也是

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -[music plays softly] -[Darren] I just wanna say, um...
translation.zh: 我只是想说

translation.en: I am so sorry for talking about my ex for so long the other night.
translation.zh: 那天晚上喋喋不休讲我前女友的事真的很抱歉

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: No. No, no. It's not. I mean...
translation.zh: 不 有关系 我那样真是太没劲了

translation.en: It's, like, the lamest thing that I could do,
translation.zh: 我那样真是太没劲了

translation.en: and I don't wanna give you the impression that I'm, like, hung up on my ex.
translation.zh: 而且我不想让你误以为我还对她念念不忘

translation.zh: -没事 没事的-帮帮我

translation.en: -[Joan] It's okay. I am helping you. -[sobbing]
translation.zh: 我在帮你

translation.en: [Joan shushing] You're just confused. Okay?
translation.zh: 你只是有些困惑 好吗？

translation.en: -[shushing] -[sobbing heavily] What is this?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: [Sarah] I don't what to do.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么办

translation.en: I don't what to do. I've tried everything. And the fabric's not working.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么办 我什么都试过了 布料不管用

translation.en: The fabric's not working, the lights aren't working.
translation.zh: 布料不管用 灯也不管用

translation.en: -[phone ringing] -I'm just really scared.
translation.zh: 我真的很害怕

translation.en: You know you can replace a negative thought with a positive thought.
translation.zh: 你可以用积极的想法取代消极的想法

translation.en: -It's never gonna stop. -You can, just try.
translation.zh: 永远不会停止的 你可以的 试一试

translation.en: -Think of things you like. -[phone stops ringing]
translation.zh: 想想你喜欢的东西

translation.en: Like marmalade. Or flowers.
translation.zh: 例如果酱 或者花 你不是很喜欢花吗？

translation.en: You know how you like flowers? Think of flowers.
translation.zh: 或者花 你不是很喜欢花吗？ 想想花

translation.en: [stammers] No, Joan, it's bigger than that.
translation.zh: 不 琼 这关乎于更大的事比一切都更大

translation.en: It's bigger than all of that. It's bigger than thoughts,
translation.zh: 不 琼 这关乎于更大的事比一切都更大 比思想更大 比时间更大

translation.en: it's bigger than time.
translation.zh: 比思想更大 比时间更大

translation.en: It's-- It's-- It's something that Helen knew.
translation.zh: 海伦因为知道了 所以被带走了

translation.en: They got her, and they're gonna get me.
translation.zh: 海伦因为知道了 所以被带走了 我也会被带走的 他们要来抓我了 琼

translation.en: They're coming after me, Joan.
translation.zh: 我也会被带走的 他们要来抓我了 琼

translation.en: [whispering] They're coming after me. They're coming after me.
translation.zh: 他们要来抓我了

translation.en: No one's coming after you, Sarah.
translation.zh: 没人会来抓你的 莎拉

translation.en: You're safe, I promise you.
translation.zh: 你很安全 我向你保证

translation.en: -No one would wanna take you. -[phone ringing] You're safe.
translation.zh: 不会有人把你带走的 你很安全

translation.en: [Joan over phone] Shannon, just go. Punch out and go.
translation.zh: 莎侬 快走 打卡回家去

translation.en: Shannon, just go. Punch out and go.
translation.zh: 莎侬 快走 打卡回家去

translation.en: [Joan whispers over phone] Sarah, put the phone down.
translation.zh: 莎拉 把电话放下

translation.en: -[whispers] Sarah, put the phone down. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 莎拉 把电话放下

translation.en: [Joan over phone] Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 一切都会没事的

translation.en: Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 一切都会没事的

translation.en: -I promise you. -I promise you.
translation.zh: 我向你保证

translation.en: -I'm your friend. -I'm your friend.
translation.zh: 我是你朋友

translation.en: I can hear the future.
translation.zh: 我能听见未来

translation.en: [nurse] I will verbally provide you with a series of questions,
translation.zh: 我会口头向你提出一系列问题

translation.en: please answer to the best of your ability.
translation.zh: 请尽你所能地回答

translation.en: When someone feels as upset as you do,
translation.zh: 当某人像你一样难过时

translation.en: they may have thoughts that life is not worth living.
translation.zh: 他们可能会觉得活着没意思

translation.en: What thoughts have you had like this?
translation.zh: 你有过什么类似的想法？

translation.en: None.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: [nurse] Okay. If you decided to end your life, how would you do so?
translation.zh: 好 如果你决定结束自己的生命你将如何实行？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: [nurse] Have you made plans to do so?
translation.zh: 是否有打算这么做？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: People often have mixed feelings about harming themselves.
translation.zh: 人们总是对伤害自己感到很纠结

translation.en: What are some things that would stop you from hurting yourself?
translation.zh: 有哪些东西能阻止你伤害自己？

translation.en: My horse.
translation.zh: 我的马

translation.en: My job.
translation.zh: 我的工作

translation.en: [nurse] Occupation?
translation.zh: 你的职业是什么？

translation.en: I'm a salesman at the craft store.
translation.zh: 我在工艺品店当推销员

translation.en: [nurse] What store is this?
translation.zh: 哪间工艺品店？

translation.en: Great Lengths.
translation.zh: 连绵布绝

translation.en: [nurse] Great Lengths?
translation.zh: 连绵布绝？

translation.en: -Great Lengths. -Okay.
translation.zh: -连绵布绝-好

translation.en: Okay. So, this will be your room.
translation.zh: 好 这是你的房间

translation.en: And this one will be your bed.
translation.zh: 而这是你的床

translation.en: Try to make yourself comfortable.
translation.zh: 尽量让自己舒服点

translation.en: [man] So, before we start, do you want some juice or some crackers?
translation.zh: 在我们开始之前要先来点果汁或饼干吗？

translation.en: Um, juice.
translation.zh: 要果汁

translation.en: There you go. All right.
translation.zh: 给 好

translation.en: All right. So, it's good to see you again.
translation.zh: 好 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: Um, I'm gonna be your social worker again this week. Um...
translation.zh: 本周我将再次当你的社工

translation.en: No, I've never been here before.
translation.zh: 不 我从没来过这里

translation.en: Oh, um... I'm sorry, I'm Ethan, I was your social worker last time.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我是伊桑 上次当过你的社工

translation.en: We talked a little bit about your horse
translation.zh: 我们聊到了你的马

translation.en: and maybe some of the crafts that you were doing.
translation.zh: 和你当时正在做的一些手工艺品

translation.en: Do you remember that?
translation.zh: 还记得吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Okay. All right. [sniffs]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: That's okay. I just wanna, um...
translation.zh: 没关系 我只是想…

translation.en: How about we just talk about now and get a sense of how you're feeling?
translation.zh: 不如我们来了解一下你现在的感受

translation.en: Um, are you experiencing any anxiety or depression?
translation.zh: 你是否感到焦虑或抑郁？

translation.en: Yeah? Anxiety?
translation.zh: 有吗？焦虑？

translation.en: Uh... Scale of one to ten, how intense?
translation.zh: 从一到十来说 有多强烈？

translation.en: -Ten. -And then how about depression?
translation.zh: 十 那抑郁呢？

translation.en: -No? Well... One? Two? Three? -One.
translation.zh: 没有吗？ -一 二 或者三-一

translation.en: One. Good. Okay.
translation.zh: 一 好

translation.en: And are you hearing any voices,
translation.zh: 有没有听见声音？

translation.en: are you seeing anything that maybe no one else is seeing?
translation.zh: 有没有看见别人或许看不到的东西？

translation.en: Yeah? And what is it that you're experiencing?
translation.zh: 有吗？ 你都经历了些什么？

translation.en: I'm, like, being taken.
translation.zh: 我被抓走了

translation.en: Like, being abducted by aliens.
translation.zh: 被外星人绑架了

translation.en: And, like, I think that they're cloning me.
translation.zh: 而且我觉得他们在克隆我

translation.en: And I've seen, like...
translation.zh: 我看过…

translation.en: Like, people always say that I look just like my grandma,
translation.zh: 人们总是说我长得很像我外婆

translation.en: and, like, I've seen photos of her, we look exactly alike.
translation.zh: 我看过她的照片 我们长得一模一样

translation.en: Like, I look like her clone.
translation.zh: 我看起来就像是她的克隆体而且我觉得…

translation.en: And-- And I think... I think that I am.
translation.zh: 我看起来就像是她的克隆体而且我觉得… 我觉得我确实是

translation.en: Like, I think I'm a clone of her.
translation.zh: 我觉得我是她的克隆体

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Um, can you tell me a little bit more about your family?
translation.zh: 你能跟我多说说你的家人吗？

translation.en: [sighs] Yeah. Um...
translation.zh: 嗯 好

translation.en: You know, people always said that my grandma was so crazy.
translation.zh: 人们总是说我外婆疯得很厉害

translation.en: Like, she was, like, talking to the walls, and, like,
translation.zh: 她会对着墙壁说话

translation.en: she was hearing voices, she thought she was from the future.
translation.zh: 她能听见声音 她认为自己来自未来

translation.en: -[Ethan] Yeah. -And she was super paranoid, and-- and, like...
translation.zh: 而且还神经兮兮 疑神疑鬼的

translation.en: Now I think that maybe she wasn't crazy at all.
translation.zh: 现在我觉得 也许她根本就没疯

translation.en: Because I'm feeling it. Like, the same thing is happening to me.
translation.zh: 因为我也感觉到了同样的事正在我身上重演

translation.en: And she was in a place like this. She got put in a place like this.
translation.zh: 而且她也被送进了这种地方

translation.en: And then, you know, Reagan closed down all the hospitals,
translation.zh: 后来里根总统关闭了所有精神病院

translation.en: and she got put out on the street, and she died as, like,
translation.zh: 她变成了流浪女沦落街头

translation.en: a homeless woman... in the streets.
translation.zh: 她变成了流浪女沦落街头 最后死在街上

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: Um, what about your mom? Did she have similar issues?
translation.zh: 那你妈呢？她有类似的问题吗？

translation.en: [tearfully] No. My mom had depression.
translation.zh: 不 我妈患有抑郁症

translation.en: [voice breaks] My mom...
translation.zh: 我妈…

translation.en: She... [sniffles]
translation.zh: 她…

translation.en: Mom was just, like, really depressed, and she killed herself... [sobs] ...last year.
translation.zh: 我妈很抑郁 去年自杀了

translation.en: I found her in her bathroom.
translation.zh: 我在她的浴室里发现了她

translation.en: She was just really depressed. She, um...
translation.zh: 她那时真的很抑郁

translation.en: She took a lot of pills.
translation.zh: 吞了很多药

translation.en: [Ethan] I'm really sorry. Um...
translation.zh: 我真的很抱歉

translation.en: How about your dad? Is he around?
translation.zh: 那你爸爸呢？他还在吗？

translation.en: No. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No. I didn't have a dad. He was...
translation.zh: 不 我没有爸爸 他…

translation.en: I mean, Gary raised me. I thought Gary was my dad, but...
translation.zh: 我是加里养大的我以为加里是我亲爸爸 但…

translation.en: he left when I was, like, 16.
translation.zh: 他在我16岁的时候离开了

translation.en: And who's Gary?
translation.zh: 而加里是谁？

translation.en: Mmm. He was my mom's husband.
translation.zh: 我妈的丈夫 前夫

translation.en: -He's her ex-husband. -[Ethan, quietly] Okay.
translation.zh: 我妈的丈夫 前夫 好

translation.en: [Ethan sighs] You've been through a lot.
translation.zh: 你经历了很多

translation.en: I want you to know that, um...
translation.zh: 我想让你知道

translation.en: I-- I believe that you're telling me your truth
translation.zh: 我相信你所告诉我的 是你的真相

translation.en: and that what you're experiencing feels 100% real to you,
translation.zh: 而你所经历的对你来说感觉绝对真实

translation.en: um, and I appreciate your honesty, I really do.
translation.zh: 我很感谢你的坦诚 真的我能感受到这一点

translation.en: I can feel that from you, and that's gonna go a long way
translation.zh: 我很感谢你的坦诚 真的我能感受到这一点 而那将大大有助于我们实现最终目标

translation.en: in terms of, um, where we wanna go.
translation.zh: 而那将大大有助于我们实现最终目标

translation.en: But I also wanna just say, for the sake of our rapport...
translation.zh: 但为了我们的友好关系 我还想说

translation.en: [chuckles] ...uh, that I... I am a bit skeptical of alien abductions and cloning,
translation.zh: 我对外星人绑架和克隆是存有疑虑的

translation.en: -um, but I-- -[Sarah] Me, too.
translation.zh: -但我…-我也是

translation.en: I know that it sounds crazy. Okay?
translation.zh: 我知道听起来很疯狂 好吗？

translation.en: I know it sounds really crazy, but it just feels really real
translation.zh: 我知道听起来很疯狂但对我来说感觉很真实 好吗？

translation.en: -to me, okay? -[Ethan] Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 我知道听起来很疯狂但对我来说感觉很真实 好吗？ 好

translation.en: And I just...
translation.zh: 我只是…

translation.en: I just wish that I could... start over.
translation.zh: 我只是希望我能重新开始

translation.en: We don't-- We don't need to go back or start over.
translation.zh: 我们不需要回头或者重新开始

translation.en: We can start from right here, and, um...
translation.zh: 我们能从现在开始

translation.en: You know, we've had great success here, and we have an incredible team.
translation.zh: 我们这里有很高的成功率也有很棒的团队

translation.en: And we-- I and they are 100% committed to helping you.
translation.zh: 我和他们都100%致力于帮助你

translation.en: [Sarah] Where's Ethan?
translation.zh: 伊桑呢？

translation.en: He said he'd watch me sleep.
translation.zh: 他说会守着我睡觉的

translation.en: [nurse] Ethan already left for the night.
translation.zh: 伊桑已经走了 今晚不会回来

translation.en: Don't worry, Sarah, we have a full staff, you'll be safe.
translation.zh: 别担心 莎拉 所有人员都在 你很安全

translation.en: Try and get some rest, it'll be good for you.
translation.zh: 好好休息吧 对你有好处的

translation.en: Okay, Sarah, have a good night.
translation.zh: 好了 莎拉 晚安

translation.en: Where have you been? Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你去了哪里？你没事吧？

translation.en: Hello? Just talk to me, just tell me where you went.
translation.zh: 喂 跟我说话啊 告诉我你去了哪里

translation.en: -[softly] Who are you? -What do you mean, who am I?
translation.zh: 你是谁？ 什么叫我是谁？

translation.en: -Why are you wearing Nikki's clothes? -These are my clothes.
translation.zh: 你为什么穿着妮琪的衣服？ 这些是我的衣服

translation.en: Okay, just tell me how you got out.
translation.zh: 快告诉我你是怎么跑出去的

translation.en: -What happened? -Where are my fabrics?
translation.zh: -发生了什么事？-我的布料呢？

translation.en: What do you mean, "fabrics"? Why are you...
translation.zh: -什么布料？-你为什么…

translation.en: You're not Nikki.
translation.zh: 你不是妮琪

translation.en: -[scoffs] What? -No, you're wearing her clothes.
translation.zh: -什么？-你穿着她的衣服

translation.en: -Why are you acting like this? -Get away from me.
translation.zh: 你干嘛这样？你到底怎么了？

translation.en: -Get away from me. -What do you mean, "Get away"?
translation.zh: -离我远点 你不是妮琪-什么叫离你远点

translation.en: -You're not Nikki. No! -I'm trying to help you!
translation.zh: 我想帮你 告诉我你去了哪里

translation.en: -Tell me where you went! -No!
translation.zh: 我想帮你 告诉我你去了哪里 -不！-开门！

translation.en: -Open up! -No!
translation.zh: -不！-开门！ -不！-快出来告诉我！

translation.en: Let me help you!
translation.zh: 让我帮你！

translation.en: Open this fucking door!
translation.zh: 快他妈开门！

translation.en: -Open this door! -[banging continues]
translation.zh: 开门！

translation.en: -Open it! -[exhales sharply]
translation.zh: 开门！

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你在这里干什么？

translation.en: I have to keep her safe.
translation.zh: 我必须保护它

translation.en: [breathing heavily] Get out of here.
translation.zh: 给我滚出去

translation.en: Get out of here!
translation.zh: 滚出去！

translation.en: Get out of here!
translation.zh: 我说滚出去！

translation.en: [Sarah whispering] Wake up, Ron.
translation.zh: 醒醒 罗恩

translation.en: Wake up.
translation.zh: 醒醒

translation.en: [Sarah] I've never seen him like that before.
translation.zh: 我不曾见过他那副样子

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -[Sarah] He was so angry. -[Darren] Yeah.
translation.zh: 他好生气 是啊

translation.en: [Sarah] It was so scary.
translation.zh: 真的好可怕

translation.en: You have nothing to be afraid of.
translation.zh: 你不需要感到害怕

translation.en: -Okay. -I'm here for you.
translation.zh: 好 有我在

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: [Darren] I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: [softly] Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: [Sarah] Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Were you just in my bed?
translation.zh: 你刚才在我床上了吗？

translation.en: Why are you in my fucking bed?
translation.zh: 你为什么会在我床上？

translation.en: [whispers] It's you.
translation.zh: 是你

translation.en: Why are you here?
translation.zh: 你为什么会在这里？

translation.en: I really don't wanna talk about that with you.
translation.zh: 我真的不想跟你聊这个

translation.en: [Sarah] Please.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Sorry. I really...
translation.zh: 抱歉 我真的…

translation.en: just wanna go back to sleep.
translation.zh: 我只想继续睡觉

translation.en: [Sarah] I'm just trying to figure out what's going on.
translation.zh: 我只是想搞清楚状况

translation.en: I know. I-- I understand. I just don't wanna talk about it.
translation.zh: 我知道 我明白 我只是不想聊那件事

translation.en: Listen to me, listen to me, listen to me.
translation.zh: 听我说

translation.en: I know you.
translation.zh: 我见过你

translation.en: I know you from somewhere that's not... here.
translation.zh: 我在别处见过你

translation.en: Do you remember me?
translation.zh: 你还记得我吗？

translation.en: I would like to go back to sleep.
translation.zh: 我想继续睡觉

translation.en: Please. Please, tell me. Just...
translation.zh: 拜托 拜托你告诉我

translation.en: tell me.
translation.zh: 告诉我

translation.en: What happened is that I went to sleep in fucking 1995,
translation.zh: 发生的事情是 1995年我去睡个觉

translation.en: and I woke up and all the buildings are different.
translation.zh: 醒来时 所有建筑物都变得不一样了

translation.en: I can't find anyone I know. I can't find where I'm supposed to be.
translation.zh: 我找不到认识的人找不到我该去的地方

translation.en: Nothing makes sense.
translation.zh: 一切都讲不通

translation.en: And every time I tell anybody that, they look at me like I'm fucking crazy,
translation.zh: 每当我告诉别人时他们都把我当疯子看

translation.en: 'cause that's a crazy thing to say.
translation.zh: 因为那是疯子会说的话

translation.en: And now you think I'm crazy.
translation.zh: 现在连你也觉得我疯了我们俩都在这里

translation.en: -And we're both fucking here! -You're not crazy.
translation.zh: 现在连你也觉得我疯了我们俩都在这里 你没疯

translation.en: You're not crazy.
translation.zh: 你没疯

translation.en: My grandmother thought she was from the future
translation.zh: 我外婆认为她来自未来

translation.en: and nobody believed her.
translation.zh: 没人相信她

translation.en: -They can take us to other times. -Who can?
translation.zh: 它们能带我们穿越时空 它们是谁？

translation.en: We're being abducted.
translation.zh: 我们被绑架了

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [Sarah] At the same time. No, no, no, no. Please listen to me.
translation.zh: 同时 不 拜托你听我说

translation.en: There's a white space.
translation.zh: 有个白色的空间

translation.en: There's-- There's-- There's a ramp floating over the ocean.
translation.zh: 有个漂浮在海面上的舷梯

translation.en: There's-- There's-- There's the, like, fingers.
translation.zh: 有类似手指的东西

translation.en: How do you know about the ramp?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道舷梯的事？

translation.en: [Sarah] You've seen it.
translation.zh: 你看过

translation.en: Yeah, that's the dream I have all the time.
translation.zh: 对 那是我常做的梦

translation.en: How do you know about that?
translation.zh: 你是怎么知道的？

translation.en: It's not a dream.
translation.zh: 那不是梦

translation.en: [woman] How do you know about that dream?
translation.zh: 你是怎么知道那个梦的？

translation.en: How do you know about that? I've never told you that.
translation.zh: 你是怎么知道的？我没告诉过你

translation.en: I believe you.
translation.zh: 我相信你

translation.en: [Ethan] Well, good morning.
translation.zh: 早安

translation.en: -Morning. -How are you feeling?
translation.zh: 早安 你感觉怎么样？

translation.en: -Good. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: -Yeah. -Good.
translation.zh: -对-很好

translation.en: I'm feeling much better having gotten some sleep.
translation.zh: 睡一觉后感觉好多了

translation.en: And... I know I'm not a clone.
translation.zh: 还有 我知道我不是克隆体

translation.en: And I think I... figured a lot of stuff out.
translation.zh: 而且我觉得我想通了很多事情

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Uh, sounds like you're making good progress.
translation.zh: 听起来你进展不错

translation.en: Um... Well, um, I have some good news.
translation.zh: 我有个好消息

translation.en: Um... You've been here almost 72 hours
translation.zh: 你在这里待了将近72个小时了

translation.en: and, um, Dr. Fung has decided to discharge you today.
translation.zh: 冯医生决定今天让你出院

translation.en: -So you're gonna be going-- -I've only been here one night.
translation.zh: -所以你将会去…-我才在这里待了一晚

translation.en: Um, well... It's been almost three days.
translation.zh: 已经快要三天了

translation.en: Um... But it's, uh...
translation.zh: 不过…

translation.en: Look, a lot of times when people come in for the first time,
translation.zh: 有很多时候 人们第一次来

translation.en: their brains are adjusting for a while,
translation.zh: 大脑会需要一段时间调整

translation.en: and it's not abnormal that you wouldn't remember everything, so...
translation.zh: 不能记住所有事情也是很正常的

translation.en: That actually makes a lot of sense.
translation.zh: 那其实非常有道理

translation.en: It's like how you told me yesterday that I had... met you before, a few weeks ago.
translation.zh: 就像你昨天告诉我我们几周前见过面一样

translation.en: I'm sorry, I didn't-- I said--
translation.zh: -抱歉 不 我是说…-完全讲得通

translation.en: It totally works. Remember how I was telling you that
translation.zh: -抱歉 不 我是说…-完全讲得通 还记得我说过我在梦里和绑架中看到一个男人吗？

translation.en: there was a guy I was seeing in my dream and, like, in the abductions,
translation.zh: 还记得我说过我在梦里和绑架中看到一个男人吗？

translation.en: but there was a girl there, too.
translation.zh: 其实还有一个女孩

translation.en: And that girl was my roommate here, and she remembers the abductions, too,
translation.zh: 那个女孩是我这里的室友她也记得绑架的事

translation.en: because we were both waking up, but Ron, the guy, wasn't,
translation.zh: 因为我们俩都在过程中醒来但那个男人罗恩并没有

translation.en: so he doesn't remember anything.
translation.zh: 所以他什么都不记得

translation.en: And they brought her here from another time. So, like...
translation.zh: 她是从另一个时空被带过来的

translation.en: it all makes sense, it's-- it's like a loop, it's continual.
translation.zh: 一切都说得通了这是个循环 是连接不断的

translation.en: It-- It-- It has to happen.
translation.zh: 是必须发生的

translation.en: I'm not a clone.
translation.zh: 我不是克隆体

translation.en: I am my grandmother.
translation.zh: 我就是我的外婆

translation.en: It's actually kinda beautiful. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这其实挺唯美的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Um... Who's the girl that you talked to?
translation.zh: 跟你说话的那个女孩是谁？

translation.en: Do you think I imagined the girl in my room?
translation.zh: 你觉得我房间里的女孩是我想象出来的吗？

translation.en: No. I-- I actually don't know anything about the room assignments, I just--
translation.zh: 不是的 我对房间怎么分配一无所知

translation.en: You know, I-- I'm here...
translation.zh: 我只是… 我在这里

translation.en: and, uh, I just would've hoped that you would refrain from taking advice from other patients.
translation.zh: 而我希望你不会听取其他病人的建议

translation.en: Well, it's not advice, it's just the truth.
translation.zh: 那不是建议 是事实

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Um... Well,
translation.zh: 那么

translation.en: this will all be in your paperwork, but I wanna highlight,
translation.zh: 这些全都会写进你的报告里但我想强调

translation.en: I-- I made an appointment for you, um,
translation.zh: 我替你在福克斯黑文诊所做了预约

translation.en: over at the Fox Haven Clinic, it's on Green Street,
translation.zh: 我替你在福克斯黑文诊所做了预约 就位于格林街 是免费的

translation.en: and, um, it's-- it's free,
translation.zh: 就位于格林街 是免费的

translation.en: and it's your choice whether you wanna go or not, but, um...
translation.zh: 去不去是你的选择 但是…

translation.en: Uh, I-- I really... hope that you go.
translation.zh: 我真的希望你会去

translation.en: Because I have high hopes for you.
translation.zh: 因为我对你有很高的期望

translation.en: And, uh, I'm-- I'm rooting for you,
translation.zh: 我会为你加油的

translation.en: and I think it'd be very important for you to follow up with that.
translation.zh: 而我觉得继续复诊对你来说非常重要

translation.en: Thanks, Ethan.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 伊桑

translation.en: I know what I need to do.
translation.zh: 我知道我该做什么

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 那么

translation.en: what is-- what is your plan?
translation.zh: 你有什么计划？

translation.en: [Cheryl] I'm not gonna pay to have them fixed,
translation.zh: 我不愿意花钱整牙

translation.en: but I wanna be able to... bite off asparagus.
translation.zh: 但我想要能够咬芦笋

translation.en: I can't bite asparagus 'cause it just goes right through my teeth.
translation.zh: 我没办法咬芦笋因为它会直接穿过我牙缝

translation.en: [Joe] Well, I thought you had those, uh...
translation.zh: 你不是有那个什么嘛

translation.en: those plates put on your teeth, those-- What do you call them? Ooh, come on.
translation.zh: 那个放在牙齿上的东东叫什么来着？ 走吧

translation.en: -[Cheryl] No, the-- My mouthguard? -[Joe] Yeah.
translation.zh: 我的牙套吗？ -对-我不戴那东西

translation.en: -[Cheryl] I don't wear that. -[Joe] That's just for snoring, or...
translation.zh: -对-我不戴那东西 那只是用来防打鼾的吗？

translation.en: [softly] Hey, my girl.
translation.zh: 嘿 我的宝贝

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I came back for you.
translation.zh: 我为了你而回来了

translation.en: My sweet girl. Look what I brought you.
translation.zh: 我的甜心 看我给你带了什么

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: I'll always protect you.
translation.zh: 我会永远保护你的

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你
